text: before you attend your new year 's parties , you have to decide what to do during the day on new year 's eve . surely it ca n't take you 12 hours to get ready for a party . and if you choose to relax a little -lrb- or a lot -rrb- in front of the television , we 've rounded up your viewing options . well , if by viewing you mean marathoning and never leaving the sofa . check out your tv marathon options below : . * note : final time is when final episode begins ; all listed in et . the mindy project season 2 -lrb- bravo , 11:30 a.m. to 5 p.m. -rrb- . the vanilla ice project -lrb- diy , 7 a.m. -rrb- followed by vanilla ice goes amish at 10 a.m. , before switching back to the vanilla ice project from 12:30 p.m. to 6:30 p.m. house hunters international -lrb- hgtv , 6:30 a.m. to 7:30 p.m. -rrb- followed by house hunters -lrb- 8 p.m. through next day -rrb- . malcolm in the middle -lrb- ifc , 6:15 a.m. to 3:45 p.m. -rrb- . awkward -lrb- mtv 8 a.m. to 4:55 p.m. -rrb- . the twilight zone -lrb- syfy 8 a.m. through next day -rrb- . law & order : special victims unit -lrb- usa 4 a.m. to 7 p.m. -rrb- . modern family -lrb- usa , 8 p.m. to 12:30 a.m. -rrb- . the walking dead -lrb- amc , 9 a.m. through next day -rrb- . the fosters -lrb- abc family , 11 a.m. to 5 p.m. -rrb- . doctor who -lrb- bbc , 1 p.m. through next day -rrb- . dr. phil -lrb- own , 6 a.m. to 3 p.m. -rrb- . cops -lrb- spike , noon through next day -rrb- . here comes honey boo boo -lrb- tlc , 4 p.m. through next day -rrb- . storage wars -lrb- a&e 6 p.m. through next day -rrb- . happy endings -lrb- vh1 , 8 p.m. through all day on new year 's -rrb- . see the original story at ew.com . click here to try 2 risk free issues of entertainment weekly .
